text: Okay, so as per the structure of our learning and compartmentalizing the various sections,
what we're focusing on now is that blue section, the spoofing and flipping.
We will be looking at various different trading strategies from false offer blocks to existing
large positions, liquidity hunting to the loan ranger and false bid blocks.
So these are all terms that we've coined here at Axia Futures and we'll be looking
the module and then again as per usual which is so fundamentally important in

market environment for spoofing and flipping and what did that look like and
